item.title: By: Denys
item.dc:creator: Denys
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/cynthia-rowley-band-aids/#comment-15">JenW</a>.
Jen, maybe you're a five year old Zooey Deschanel. I have Hello Kitty bandaids AND camo bandaids. Because I like to mix it up like that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JenW.

Jen, maybe you’re a five year old Zooey Deschanel. I have Hello Kitty bandaids AND camo bandaids. Because I like to mix it up like that.

item.title: By: JenW
item.dc:creator: JenW
item.description: Those band-aids are way cool! I will have to get some becuase I currently have Carebear themed band-aides in my medicine cabinet (I am either 5 years old, or Zooey Deschanel).
item.content:encoded: Those band-aids are way cool! I will have to get some becuase I currently have Carebear themed band-aides in my medicine cabinet (I am either 5 years old, or Zooey Deschanel).
